sentence: The Home Depot Inc.HD is making preparations to welcome the spring season, which is the company's busiest selling period.

After last week's announcement of the largest home improvement retailer hiring over 80,000 workers across the U.S., the company's Canada division has now come up with plans to employ nearly 6,000 workers.
This Atlanta-based company has already begun the hiring process, which is open for candidates willing to work part time or full time at its stores and distribution centers.
Further, these positions can be filled in by job seekers from all categories, including college students, retirees and experienced individuals.
Under this placement plan, the company will ensure jobs for candidates across its 2,000 U.S. stores or 182 Canadian outlets.
Apart from securing seasonal employment, some of these workers will be entitled to other benefits too, if their seasonal position is changed into a permanent one.
These benefits include gaining from the company's profit-sharing plan, "Success Sharing", its 401k match and tuition support.
In Canada, the company has lined up more than 400 career events for candidates interested in working with Home Depot Canada.

Unlike other retailers that await the holiday season, home improvement retailers such as Lowe's Companies Inc. LOW and Home Depot wait for spring as customers usually do up their gardens, lawns and homes during this season.
Consequently, Home Depot is making all arrangements to embrace the spring season.
Home Depot currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold).
Better-ranked stocks in the same industry include Beacon Roofing Supply Inc. BECN and Builders FirstSource Inc. BLDR , each with a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
